song.title: The guy called nate
song.info:
There is a guy I know called Nate Who can consume a whole damn crate Of Guinness, if he gets the chance, Which proves that he is not from France.
He resides somewhere in the UK Where it rains every fucking day. I'm not sure, I have my doubts, But I think that's why his site's called ???
Hooray, a chance for you! There's no guy I'd rather do If I was gay, but since I'm straight I'd rather make a song about the guy called Nate.
Metal detectors at Heathrow Always refuse to let him through 'Cause he's got piercings everywhere, Kinda like a punk-rock Yogi Bear. Oh wait, that was a bad rhyme.
If there was a World Cup in coolness, I'd surely win. I rock so radical, but I'm sure Nate would be runner-up.
Hooray, a chance for you! There's no guy I'd rather do If I was gay, but since I'm straight I'd rather make a song about the guy called Nate. Hooray, a chance for you! There's no guy I'd rather do If I was gay, but since I'm straight I'd rather make a song about the guy called Nate. Hooray, hooray, for you...
